briefTitle: THERMOCOOL® SMARTTOUCH™ Catheter for the Treatment of Symptomatic Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation CONTINUED ACCESS
officialTitle: THERMOCOOL® SMARTTOUCH™ Catheter for the Treatment of Symptomatic Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation Continued Access
conditions: Drug Refractory Symptomatic Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
summary: This is a prospective, multicenter, non-randomized continued access clinical evaluation utilizing the THERMOCOOL® SMARTTOUCH™ catheter.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Achieved Freedom From Atrial Tachyarrhythmias
